story:
The old grandmother Tina arrives in town to attend the wedding of his nephew Alberto with his girlfriend Ileana.
Upon arrival she discovers that she has been stolen of a medallion that her late husband had given her.
He goes to the police station to file a complaint and get the dear object back, but given the length of the investigation, he decides to carry out the search for the thief himself, combining a great deal of mess.
Eventually, by chance, he finds the thief, who lives in the same hotel, also managing to have an entire gang of criminals arrested.
The grandson Alberto can marry the beautiful Ileana and the grandmother Tina will be appointed, by merit, an honorary colonel of the female police.
view1: Grandmother Tina arrived in the vibrant town, her heart already swelling with anticipation for Alberto's long-awaited wedding to Ileana. However, the joyful atmosphere quickly dissipated when she made the distressing discovery that her cherished medallion, a final, tangible link to her beloved late husband, had vanished. Grief-stricken and utterly determined, she approached the local authorities to report the theft, but the prospect of a drawn-out, impersonal investigation felt unbearable. Compelled by an urgent, personal calling to reclaim her precious memento, she embarked on her own unconventional quest, inadvertently stirring up considerable commotion across the community. Fate, it seemed, was on her side, as she serendipitously stumbled upon the culprit—lodged in the very same hotel—an encounter that spectacularly led to the unmasking and apprehension of an entire criminal syndicate. With her beloved keepsake restored and justice undeniably served, the path was cleared for her grandson Alberto to happily marry the beautiful Ileana. In a profound testament to her extraordinary grit and unexpected heroism, Grandmother Tina was subsequently honored with the esteemed title of honorary colonel within the female police force.
view2: The occasion of Alberto's wedding to Ileana necessitated his grandmother, Tina, traveling to the town. Shortly following her arrival, she formally reported the theft of a valuable medallion, a personal item given to her by her deceased husband. A complaint was duly filed with the police department regarding the missing property. However, demonstrating clear dissatisfaction with the projected duration for official inquiries, Tina commenced an independent search for the item, which generated significant public disruption. Through a fortunate and unforeseen turn of events, she located the perpetrator residing within her own hotel, a circumstance that culminated directly in the successful apprehension of not only the thief but also an associated criminal organization. This swift resolution ensured that Alberto's marriage to Ileana proceeded without further impediment. Consequently, Grandmother Tina received an honorary colonel's appointment from the female police, acknowledging her direct and impactful involvement in the affair.
